description: Numerators of continued fraction convergents to sqrt(156).
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..200
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0,50,0,-1).
mathematica: Numerator[Convergents[Sqrt[156], 30]] (* or *) CoefficientList[Series[(12 + 25 x + 12 x^2 - x^3)/(1 - 50 x^2 + x^4), {x, 0, 25}], x] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Nov 01 2013 *)
prog: (MAGMA) I:=[12,25,612,1249]; [n le 4 select I[n] else 50*Self(n-2)-Self(n-4): n in [1..25]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Nov 01 2013
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
